Articles.Content:
I\'ve been wondering how to do this so i am offering it as a challenge.

Cause a crash explosion or anything disastrous that will only kill one or two of the crew(there should be 1 or 2 alive) after the events settled down (you should wait till the explosions / collisions are over).

PS: I don\'t know if this is possible or written in the code just want to see someone achieving this.

Impossible. Either everybody dies, or nobody. Sorry

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T16:45:40Z" title="05/13/2015 04:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by Emilio**

It\'s possible with ZO2 and either electrical energy or powertech plugin (if you are good, it should work with ZO2 only). 

And you can click so fast that it shows the flight report before all are dead ;P

What if you had the Oxygene mod, crashed [in the process destroying enough of your reserve tanks that there is only enough for one Kerbal], before engaging solar panels/oxygen extraction system/ramscoop to keep that Kerbal alive?

> 
> Unpossible. Either everybody dies, either nobody. Sorry

Then how come it is possible to see 1-2 kerbals alive during the impact? I\'m confused.

By clicking fast so it shows up the fail screen before they are all dead.

If it\'s not that, pictures or it didn\'t happen.
